column4: my system hangs when i try to mount a cdrom. what could be the reason? (i know that the drive is at least partially ok: i booted the liveCD i'm running on now from it)
i'm talking about what happens when i try to mount a CD from the system booted from HD. i'm not trying to mount a CD from within a Gentoo liveCD and ask for help about it here from all places.
